prereq.p: As a first integration step, you implement a so-called provisioning service that exposes its operations as a Web service. A provisioning service is required for integrating an application with the subscription management of . The provisioning service is called by when customers subscribe to a service and manage their subscriptions. Additionally, the provisioning service may be called for creating and managing users.

p.ph: You do not need to implement a provisioning service if you have chosen to use the external access type.
For details on access types, refer to .
